Class PaymentScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.PaymentScreenController
public class PaymentScreenController extends BaseController
Controller to execute all logic required for taking payment method and start a new renting session

    • payDeposit

      public PaymentTransaction payDeposit(int amount, String contents, String cardNumber, String cardHolderName, String expirationDate, String securityCode) throws PaymentException, UnrecognizedException
      Pay Deposit to start Renting bike
      Parameters:
      amount - deposit amount
      contents - content of transaction
      cardNumber - card number
      cardHolderName - card owner's name
      expirationDate - date of expiration of the credit card
      securityCode - CVV code
      Returns:
      respond
      Throws:
      PaymentException - payment error
      UnrecognizedException - unrecognized error
